titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4909) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2017 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4909) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2017 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-569, by Mr. Byrne.

The bill shall be considered for amendment under the five minute rule. No further amendment to the bill, as amended, shall be in order expect those printed in part B of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution and amendments en bloc described in section 3 of the resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 114.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 732.
DEBATE - The House resumed with one hour of debate on H. Res. 732.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 732, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Polis demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 239 - 177 (Roll no. 196).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 181 (Roll no. 197).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4909) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2017 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year.
